name: h3
description: The 2026 Louisville Slugger Meta Drop 10 USA Baseball Bat is crafted for players seeking a balanced swing feel with its innovative two-piece composite design. Certified by USA Baseball, this bat features a 2 5/8 inch barrel diameter and showcases a striking red, gold, and black colorway. The EKO Composite Material ensures a lightweight feel while delivering a massive barrel for powerful hits. Its VCX3 Connection minimizes hand vibration, offering superior feedback, while the GT1 End Cap optimizes barrel length and swing speed. Additionally, the LS Pro Comfort Grip provides the perfect mix of tack and cushion for enhanced control and comfort during play.
